website_summaries.verdict: The absolute best value for your money when it comes to getting a high performance unit for a good price.
pros: A mid-level garage door opener with an efficient operating system that gives you what you need
cons: Chain drive isn't as quiet as direct or belt-drive models

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased almost 3 years ago and writing a review today as I need another to replace an aged Chamberlain Liftmaster. The LM has had the circuit board replaced twice and despite being a belt drive is incredibly noisy. It now has a gear that has failed but at 15yrs old, I'm not going to repair it. The Decko, which replaced another LM 3 years back, is going strong and is super quiet. I did have to call customer service when I initially installed it for a stripped gear but they overnighted a replacement at no cost for something that was likely my error. For that, I won't deduct a star. Overall, easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: R. Freeze

customer_reviews.title: looks good but only 4 stars
customer_reviews.text: the unit was easy to install with two people. the instructions were easy to follow so why 4 stars. the unit appeared to be well made: but: the plastic pieces that hold the bulb covers were cheaply made and it's good they sent 5 because one broke when trying to install them. that's probably why they sent an extra. I'm guessing when I have to change the bulbs i'll have another break. except for this I'm satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: jack

customer_reviews.title: Buy Decko 24503 - Get Quality
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this Decko belt-drive garage door opener. It is extremely quiet/smooth in operation. There is no way you will get the quality built in this opener from a Craftsman or Genie opener in the same price range. But, I the thing that impressed me most is the complete and detailed instructions with pictures/drawings for installation. It is absolutely the best installation manual I have ever worked with.
customer_reviews.author: mrvancee

customer_reviews.title: easy to install. Great customer service by Decko
customer_reviews.text: I was able to put this by myself. Although the logic board was bad the company sent me a new right away. I will say Decko has a great customer service!! I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Terri L. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: The Instruction Manual... It's Your Sure Guide To Success!
customer_reviews.text: I have the tools, the skills, and the time in retirement to tackle a lot of DIY home projects. The instruction manual provided by Decko was the most complete guide to assembling a product I've ever encountered. It did take me several days (working by myself required some add'l rigging; and the old unit needed to be removed first)... but by carefully following the clear directions -- step-by-step -- you'll succeed in installing a fine new garage door opener that's quiet, powerful, and operates with some smart safety features. ~ DG
customer_reviews.author: Donald W. Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Finally, as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Bad experiences and bad reviews caused me to try the Decko. It arrived as promised, and the instruction booklet was clear and precise; pleasant surprise. Time will tell if it continues, but it is a powerful and much quieter machine and a good experience.
customer_reviews.author: Wormy

customer_reviews.title: Easy install
customer_reviews.text: No instructions in box. Found on website and saved paper using my iPad to install. Wish more manufactures did this. Easy to install and program. Used 8' extension. Very quiet opener. Very happy with purchase. Really appreciated the pressure wire clips instead of screws.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install if you just follow the instructions
customer_reviews.text: Well written installation instructions as if they were done by an Army/ Air Force technical writer. Following the instructions, the installation was easy and the end result was flawless. Perfect first time set up and operation and its been working without trouble for 4 weeks now..... and my installation needed that 3/4th HP motor. Glad I chose this brand. No disappointment here in any form. Very happy with it and the price was right.
customer_reviews.author: Gary LeRoy Parks

customer_reviews.title: Easy install
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install, good directions, like the slow start and end feature and the easy adjust travel limits.
customer_reviews.author: Ray W.

customer_reviews.title: Installed easily and it is very quiet
customer_reviews.text: Installed easily and it is very quiet. Programming the door limits a breeze. I was missing two bolts for the two arm connection pieces to the door. No big deal, I used the bolts from the one I was replacing.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Quiet.
customer_reviews.text: Installed this morning before work, simple easy to follow instructions. My wife didn't even hear it from inside the house.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I've been waiting to review this as I was unsure ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been waiting to review this as I was unsure of it's longevity. I initially felt uncomfortable with the delay when pressing the openner. So far it's working well. I give it 4 instead of 5 stars because it seems a bit temperamental at times on when it will accept the signal from the remote openner.
customer_reviews.author: w max lizotte

customer_reviews.title: Garage Door opener.
customer_reviews.text: OK at best, lots of problems to overcome at first. Installer had never heard of this brand so don't know long term reliability.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lifts heavy door easily
customer_reviews.text: Very good door opener for my heavy solid wood door. Pleased with its performance. Very quiet compared to the opener to replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Richard J.

customer_reviews.title: Its just ok. would not buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Problems with it right after insulation, clicking noise from unit when it travels up. light only goes on after you open door. If door left open and you walk past sensors that will not turn on light. :((((
customer_reviews.author: Jim V

customer_reviews.title: Nice product and Decko has great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic customer service by DECKO! They are patient with the "do it yourself" folks and can help trouble shoot the blinks and blips to figure out what is what. Great company and good product. We've had our new opener for 4 months now.
customer_reviews.author: MClark

customer_reviews.title: Garage opener.
customer_reviews.text: Works good and looks good. Wall button feels cheap and sometimes need to press twice to open.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Frederiksen

customer_reviews.title: The motor is defective
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed It did not work I am returning it I could not returned sooner because I was in the hospital with a difficult surgery, kidney cancer
customer_reviews.author: marta vigil

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This opener is much quieter than the 30 year old unit that it replaced. I have heard quieter units, but this one is chain driven, not belt driven which makes a difference. There is a slight delay in opening or closing the door when using the remote unit which I don't really understand. Sometimes, I have to hit the button twice to get it to work, but it does work and it works well. Overall, a very good garage door opener. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: LadyC

customer_reviews.title: Easy enough to install--works good after you get it to ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy enough to install--works good after you get it to work-- the electronics are pure junk--have to be be right at the door and push the button 4 or 5 time and maybe it will start--the factory "hard wired" outside keypad is just as bad. I am a builder and used this on my personal house. I know what operators are supposed to do and how they are supposed to operate. This one's remote and keypad don't cut it. Mechanically the operator is good. The electronics will keep me from ever buying another one from them. Nowhere near the standard of quality I was expecting and no where near the quality of others that we have used. They work
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: it's okay
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a decent opener; however, not as good quality as I had with same power unit I was replacing after 15 years. Range of the car remote is awful. You have to be right outside the garage door. Then the unit "thinks" about opening for a few beats so you don't know if you hit the button right or not. The exterior closer panel button has to be held constantly to close, or else it will go back up. That's not a huge problem, just annoying if you are in a hurry. Would I buy it again.....probably not. It is worth returning....probably not.
customer_reviews.author: ppurchase

customer_reviews.title: QUIET and STURDY
customer_reviews.text: Works well, sturdy and quiet. We have to hire a professional for installation.
customer_reviews.author: MsJsmart_21

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I watched the Decko garage install video on Youtube and then simply followed the directions. It works great and good value for your money.
customer_reviews.author: Avigial Saacks

customer_reviews.title: came on time and exactly as describe
customer_reviews.text: The garage lift works perfectly, was easy to install with clear directions. Love it, would not hesitate to recommend this item to a friend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: lifts a heavy steel 16'x8' door, after adding the 1' extention kit
customer_reviews.author: ken hutchings

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect design
customer_reviews.text: Easy install. Only thing I didn't like was the main 3 piece rail for which the chain rides around. They do not bolt together so it took some engineering to stiffen the rail and keep it straight. Once that happened, the door opener was very quiet and powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Top of the line opener
customer_reviews.text: Top of the line opener. Quiet and smooth operation. Your garage door will make more noise than this opener.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Opener worked like a champ right away
customer_reviews.text: The installation was simple, Opener worked like a champ right away, it's quieter than I expected after reading about several openers. Would highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Nice purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very good directions. Fairly straight forward if you're a handy person. Like the smoothness and quiet of the unit also. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Peaslee

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: Received it quickly, installation was a breeze and it is very quiet, surprising for a chain drive system! Had a screw drive system at our old house that I loved, tried to save a little cash with this one very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet and easy to install. Programming was more user friendly than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Stergios K.

customer_reviews.title: Good opener and quiet.
customer_reviews.text: My husband installed this but it came with a bad circuit board. The company sent a new one out right away and the opener worked just fine. did need some adjustment later but it was a pretty easy fix for my husband to do. Went together in about a hour.
customer_reviews.author: jenpaulhome

customer_reviews.title: It's so quiet and nice: )
customer_reviews.text: Took my husband and I no time to put this together and install it. It's so quiet and nice :)
customer_reviews.author: RoAnn Cramer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this opener, would recommend to a friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow! What a Great Garage Door Opener
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit about a year ago and thought it was cool the way the unit programs itself after being installed. Installation was relatively easy if you just follow directions. About a week ago, my grandson jumped up and was swinging from the drive belt and he broke it. I called Decko's customer service in the morning and the replacement belt was here the next day. I couldn't find the owners manual in my files, so I called customer service and they kindly talked me through the belt replacement. They seem like wonderful and caring people. I would absolutely recommend this garage door opener.
customer_reviews.author: PoolPicasso

customer_reviews.title: Cheap China Low Quality!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this unit. It's outdated with tech from the early 2000's. Cheap cheap cheap quality starting from the sensors to the wall remote to the keypad and motor once operational it stared clicking every time the gear would turn. This unit should be worth less than $100 and don't have a clue why is priced at $250 !!!! So ridiculous;
customer_reviews.author: Juan Rodriguez

product_meta.title: Decko 24300 3/4 Horse Power Heavy Duty Reduced Noise Chain Drive Garage Door Opener with 3 Function Locking Wall Control, Two - 3 Button Remotes and FREE Wireless Key pad
product_meta.description:
Style:Chain Drive"DECKO MANUFACTURING" GARAGE DOOR OPENER features a strong and reliable chain drive with auto reverse safety system, emergency safety release and non-polarized wiring for easy installation. Used for sectional garage doors up to 7' tall and up to 18' wide. Package includes: Opener, two 3 button wireless remote controls, three function wall panel, wireless keyless entry pad, optical safety sensors and assembly instructions. Opener offers a dual light (up to 100 watts per light) lighting system, light bulbs sold separately. Lifetime limited motor warranty and 1 year on the parts. 3/4 Hp - Chain Drive

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Powerful 3/4 HP chain drive operating system. Two 3 button remotes, wireless keyless entry pad, three function wall panel (light, lock and open/close), optical safety sensors, auto reverse safety system. 200 watt lighting system (2-bulbs not included). Powerful 3/4 HP DC motor for quite reliable operation. Auto reverse safety system with optical sensors. Non-polarized wired connections for easy installation. Lifetime limited motor warranty. Designed to handle extreme cold and heat. To ensure quality, Decko openers go through a 20 point quality control inspection. Decko garage door openers were created for the end user or self-installing consumer in mind. Ease of installation is the number one reason Decko GDOs will exceed your expectations. HomeLink compatible.
feature_bullets: Easy installation featuring non-polarized wiring making installing the wiring error free
Handles sectional garage doors up to 7 feet tall and 18 feet wide
8 foot extension is available to accommodate larger doors
Accessories included: 3 function wall panel, two 3 button remotes and FREE wireless keypad
Easy installation featuring non-polarized wiring making installing the wiring error free
Handles sectional garage doors up to 7 feet tall and 18 feet wide
8 foot extension is available to accommodate larger doors
Accessories included: 3 function wall panel, two 3 button remotes and wireless keypad
